#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<math.h>
#include<string.h>
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{ int t;
 cin>>t;
 cin.ignore();
 while(t--)
 { string s; 
   int x,i,j=0,count=0;
  getline(cin,s);
 for(i=0;i<s.length();i++)
 { if(s[i]==' ')
   { cout<<"$"; count++; }
   else
   {  x=pow(s[i]-97,2);
      if(i==s.length()-1 || s[i+1]==' ')
      cout<<x;
      else
     cout<<x<<"-";
   }
} cout<<endl;
} 
}
